updates.title: Customization: Theme
descriptions: Qmath can now be customized with a theme. You can choose apps theme by clicking on the theme button at the top right of the browser.
Added counter for answer you have done.

updates.title: True App: Instalation & Offline Capability
descriptions: You can now install the Qmath application on your device through the browser. Click on the three dots at the top right of the browser and then click on install Qmath.
Once you access the Qmath application, you can access it again offline as long as the cache is available.

updates.title: New Feature: Stopwatch & Score
descriptions: Qmath can now calculate your score based on the number of correct answers and the average response time.
